entry.name: Economy0
entry.value: "Without cities and infrastructure, there is no economy."

entry.name: Economy1
entry.value: "Red numbers everywhere! It can't get any worse, surely?"

entry.name: Economy2
entry.value: "Our market pales compared to that of the competition."

entry.name: Economy3
entry.value: "We have a flourishing economy!"

entry.name: Economy4
entry.value: "Our economy is one of the driving forces behind the planetary market."

entry.name: Economy5
entry.value: "Years upon years of hard labor have come to fruition: our economy is unrivaled!"

entry.name: Diplomacy0
entry.value: "No contact with other factions has been established yet."

entry.name: Diplomacy1
entry.value: "We are isolated and hated by many! I beg you to reconsider your actions!"

entry.name: Diplomacy2
entry.value: "The other factions have started to distance themselves from us."

entry.name: Diplomacy3
entry.value: "We are respected by the other faction leaders."

entry.name: Diplomacy4
entry.value: "We are on good terms with other factions. Keep it up!"

entry.name: Diplomacy5
entry.value: "Great job, other faction leaders like or even love us! We can count on their support."

entry.name: Military0
entry.value: "We have no military and are entirely helpless!"

entry.name: Military1
entry.value: "Our troop numbers are pathetic! Any halfway formidable foe will simply roll over us."

entry.name: Military2
entry.value: "Our military strength is too low, we might not hold off an invasion."

entry.name: Military3
entry.value: "We have solid military forces able to deal with enemy aggression."

entry.name: Military4
entry.value: "Your army stands strong and ready to handle prolonged campaigns."

entry.name: Military5
entry.value: "Our forces are unrivaled and the finest on the planet. Enemies tremble in fear!"

entry.name: Research0
entry.value: "We have not yet discovered any technologies."

entry.name: Research1
entry.value: "We are years behind the other factions and ridiculed by many!"

entry.name: Research2
entry.value: "Other factions have passed us, time to optimize our priorities!"

entry.name: Research3
entry.value: "Our research is going well."

entry.name: Research4
entry.value: "Good news! We are one of the most advanced factions on the planet."

entry.name: Research5
entry.value: "I am proud to inform you that we have surpassed everyone -- our scientists are unrivaled."
